reviews.review: Talk about a roller coaster ride!  Infinity War Part 1 does a mash-up for the MCU that usually only happens in Marvel Comics. I was caught up in the good guys and the bad guy.  The jokes may have been forced at times, but it's Marvel.

"Marvel, once again producing a stunner"

Infinity War has everything an action movie needs, good story line, great acting, Great action scenes, and even some funny jokes here and there.
Now I will keep this spoiler free until the end( don't worry I'll give a warning )

Now let's get into the pros about this movie.

This movie has many pros, an easy to follow story like even kids can understand, and even a fair bit of great to watch action scenes. My personal favourite being when black panther has a huge fight.

I like the fact that Thanos needs 6 stones, instead of just needing 1 big powerful stone that's hard to find. 

The cons

The ending was a bit cheap and obviously a setup to the next movie, also a great tip when watching this movie, stay for the end credits, it's crucial. Also, I felt like it wasn't all the Avengers, it felt like they were all seperate. It was like iron man and his little gang were the main characters, and the Captain Americas gang was just there for a fight at the end of the movie.

Spoiler Alert!!!!




The deaths in this were shocking. The saddest would 100% be Spider-Man, no doubt. So when other people died it felt like it happened South those deaths didn't matter. 

Last thing, Thanos got the stones way to easy. He just came to earth and got like 2 straight away.

Otherwise great movie and I recommend it to any super hero loving guy or girl.

-Chris Boloutis
Australia
The writers fell in a plot hole so big they couldn't get out. Don't waste your time or money.
Great movie! Action packed and all the movies from the Marvel comic series. Blended seamlessly to create yet another fantastic Marvel movie.
THE BEST MCU FILM OF ALL TIME!

Totally blew my expectations. It is definitely not your typical Marvel Movie or Super Hero Movie. Went above and beyond all expectations. Such a good movie with the "leaves you with wanting more" cliff hanger ending. Now is one of my favorite movies of all time, that's for sure!
This was awesome!  You will laugh and you will cry! Action packed and couldn't ask for a better movie!
Amazing, Wonderful, this movie has a lot of changes and an amazing energy, thanos is really bad and a  son of a bitch
